turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello Sara can you make a pick up order from Hungry Howies for me for dinner with the family tonight?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure thing, which Hungry Howies should I make the order for? I think there are two in area from what I can remember.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks, umm... how about the one off Belleville rd in Belleville next to Walmart and Menards. That one is pretty close and on my way home.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, what would you like me to order from there for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Lets go with 2 large Pizzas. One with bacon, black olives and green peppers. On the other one lets just go with pepperoni and extra cheese for the kids.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, I have two pizzas, one with bacon, peppers, and olives and the other with just pepperoni and extra cheese. Is there anyhting else you might want before i place an order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, can you also add a Howie bread with ranch dip and a 2 liter of Diet cola. Pepsi or Coke is fine I do not know what they carry.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure thing! Should I place the order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, but wait I almost forgot I want to get cajun crust on the bacon pizza and butter crust on the pepperoni one.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay so add cajun to the bacon pizza and butter garlic to the pepperoni.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope just butter crust no garlic on the pepperoni one.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Oh okay sorry you broke up there a little bit at the end.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No problem. I want it to kind of plain the kids do not like garlic that much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Kid friendly I understand! So to some it up one more time you want me to order One large pizza with Bacon, olives and green peppers with cajun crust. One large pizza with pepperoni and extra cheese with butter crust. An order of Howie Bread with Ranch dip and a 2 liter of pop either Pepsi or Coke will do?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yep! that all sounds about right.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay hold on I am about to place an order for you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay thanks just let me know when it will be ready for pick.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hey I just placed that order for you they said it will be ready for pick up in 25 minutes or so.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Awesome thanks Sara! Just to double check that is the one off Belleville next to Walmart right?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes thats one! I just sent you the receipt via text.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Cool I just got it, thanks a bunch I will talk to you soon!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay you are welcome talk to you soon! Bye!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Bye!

items.name: Belleville rd in Belleville next to Walmart and Menards
